{{Actor| | type = Map spot | name = Laughter | class = HereticSoundSequence9 | game = Heretic | doomednum = 1208 }}[[Classes]]: [[Classes:SoundSequence|SoundSequence]]→<u>HereticSoundSequence9</u>
Plays sound sequence number 8 from the list of Heretic's environmental sound sequences.
==== [[DECORATE]] definition ==== ACTOR <u>HereticSoundSequence9</u> : {{Class|SoundSequence}} { {{Property|Args}} 8 }
==== [[SNDSEQ]] definition ==== :AFX_Laughter environment 8 slot [[HereticAmbience]] playtime world/amb9 16 volumerel -3.15 playtime world/amb9 16 volumerel -3.15 playtime world/amb9 16 volumerel -3.15 playtime world/amb10 16 volumerel -3.15 playtime world/amb10 16 volumerel -3.15 playuntildone world/amb10 end
